metadata.title: CVE-2024-42298 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: fsl: fsl_qmc_audio: Check devm_kasprintf() returned valuedevm_kasprintf() can return a NULL pointer on failure but this returnedvalue is not checked.Fix this lack and check the returned value.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
